Name: Lago Maggiore
Review Text: Pizza is decent, nothing special but for the price it’s nice. Ordered several times over the past year but had to wait over two hours on three different occasions, so will look for a new place.

Name: Lago Maggiore
Review Text: You should only come here during slow hours. 15:00-17:00. Food and coffee is very good at the price. Lasanga sauce was split and was told it was normal.

Name: Lago Maggiore
Review Text: First time and last time! Waiting time almost two hours. Ordered a shoarma pizza, which arrived cold and without garlic sauce. Never again.
